resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103025</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103025</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202758</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Take Action, Save the Past (Archaeology)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nehmen-Tätigkeit, außer der Vergangenheit 
(Archäologie)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Agir, économiser le passé (archéologie)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ação da tomada, excepto o passado (archaeology)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Di ag, risparmi l'esperienza (archaeology)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λάβετε μέτρα, εκτός από το παρελθόν (αρχαιολογία)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acción de la toma, excepto el pasado 
(archaeology)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson hones students' problem-solving skills by having them tackle the problem of saving archaeological sites from destruction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion abzieht problemlösende Fähigkeiten
der Kursteilnehmer indem sie sie das Problem des Sicherns der 
archäologischen Sites von der Zerstörung anpacken läßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon rectifie les qualifications de 
résolution des problèmes des étudiants en les faisant aborder le 
problème de sauvegarder les sites archéologiques de la destruction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição afia habilidades problem-solving dos 
estudantes mandando as tackle o problema de conservar locais 
archaeological da destruição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione smerigliatrice le abilità per la 
risoluzione di problemi degli allievi facendole affrontare il problema
di salvare i luoghi archaeological dalla distruzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα ακονίζει τις δεξιότητες επίλυσης 
προβλήματος των σπουδαστών από την κατοχή τους αντιμετωπίζει το 
πρόβλημα τις αρχαιολογικές περιοχές από την καταστροφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección afila con piedra las habilidades 
problem-solving de los estudiantes haciendo que aborden el problema de
salvar sitios arqueológicos de la destrucción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:UNC ARCHAEOLOGY
FN:UNC ARCHAEOLOGY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202758</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103025</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/take-action-save-the-past-archaeology</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
